result.execSummary:
The defendant Kenneth B Tarver II was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Fin.Trans.Card-Fraudulent Use (<=$2500) [Modifiers: Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.41(5)(a)1a.
  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime, Repeater], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Kenneth B Tarver II

with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Kenneth B Tarver in court with attorney J Anthony Rosario.  Ted S. Szczupakiewicz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended information filed in Court.  Defendant pleads guilty to counts #2 and 3 on the amended information.  Court finds the defendant guilty of counts 2 and 3.  Count #1 is dismissed and read in.  State makes recommendations,  they complied with victims rights.  Attorney Rosario makes statements.  Defendant makes statements. 

The Court Orders the Following:  Count 2    
Sentence of:
9 months huber,  STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS, concurrent to count #3.   (Credit - 121 days) commences immediately.
COSTS:  $253.00 to be paid within 90 days, alternate to nonpayment of the costs is 5 days huber consecutive to the 9 months, concurrent to any other case. 

The Court Orders the Following:  Count 3   
Sentence of:
9 months huber,  STANDARD RELEASE CONDITIONS, concurrent to count #2.   (Credit - 121 days) commences immediately.
COSTS:  $243.00 to be paid within 90 days, alternate to nonpayment of the costs is 5 days huber consecutive to the 9 months, concurrent to any other case.
Plea/sentencing hearing at 01-22-2016 08:30 am
from DCI to be produced by 1/20/2016.

Defendant Kenneth B Tarver appeared by attorney J Anthony Rosario.  Timothy Suha appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court tried to get the defendant by video conference, to no avail.  Court to do an OTP from DCI for the next hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for January 22, 2016 at 08:30 am.
